metadata.title: CVE-2020-14424 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cacti before 1.2.18 allows remote attackers to trigger XSS via templateimport for the midwinter theme.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14424` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cacti package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
